feed.title: TourWay Bag Factory
feed.subtitle: Face to face bag factory in China

entry.title: Slim Leather Wallet Credit Card Case Sleeve Card Holder With Id Window, Yellow
entry.content:
Additional information

It is time to SLIM your everyday wallet.

Are you fed up with the bulging wallet? It’s probably not your fault before your meet our super thin card case wallet. Now it is time to slim your wallet, we are offering you a wallet that is practical, durable, and also, affordable. This slim card sleeve is designed to carry some most frequently used credit cards, folded cash, IDs or driver license.

Perfect for

  • When you always pay with cards
  • Shopping at a nearby grocery
  • A lightweight wallet when jogging
  • Having your gym card in
  • Carrying access cards
  • Your MetroCard

Card Holder Benefits

  • Ultra thin - measures 4.1 x 3 x 0.1 inches
  • Lightweight - weighs 0.7 oz - literally light as a feather
  • Hold 6-8+ cards
  • 2 versions for choices - One with ID window and the other without ID window
  • Available in several beautiful candy colors
  • Easy access to cash or credit cards
  • 100% satisfaction guaranteed

PLEASE KINDLY NOTE that this credit card wallet has 2 versions, one is WITH ID WINDOW, and the other version is WITHOUT ID WINDOW. Make sure you’ve chosen the right one you need when you make a purchase. If you need a wallet that can carry more cards and cash, please visit our store and we have a series of slim wallets available for your choice.

AttributeValue
Product Dimensions4.1 x 0.1 x 3.1 inches
Shipping Weight4 ounces
entry.summary: Additional informati
